DataSource.name: prmd

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchProductIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prod_sys_id from ( select distinct a.prod_sys_id as prod_sys_id, a.prod_nm as prod_nm, a.prod_vrsn_nbr as prod_vrsn_nbr from PROD_MSTR a INNER JOIN enty_domn_info b on a.prod_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn c on b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id LEFT OUTER JOIN item d on d.PRMRY_CD=a.PROD_FMLY_NM and d.CTLG_ID='1937' where b.enty_type = 'product' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and (
order by prod_nm asc, prod_vrsn_nbr asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchProductIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prod_sys_id from ( select distinct a.prod_sys_id as prod_sys_id, a.prod_nm as prod_nm, a.prod_vrsn_nbr as prod_vrsn_nbr from PROD_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.prod_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'product' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and
order by prod_nm asc, prod_vrsn_nbr asc)

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.prod_sys_id from PROD_MSTR a where a.prod_strctr_sys_id = {0} order by a.prod_nm asc, a.prod_vrsn_nbr asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortProductIdentifiers

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN a,PROD_MSTR b where a.NOTE_ID = {0} and a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = {1} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHPRODUCT' and b.PROD_SYS_ID = a.ENTY_SYS_ID order by b.prod_nm asc, b.prod_vrsn_nbr asc

prmd

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchProductStructureIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prod_strctr_sys_id from ( select distinct a.prod_strctr_sys_id as prod_strctr_sys_id, a.prod_strctr_nm as prod_strctr_nm, a.prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr as prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.prod_strctr_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'ProdStructure' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and (
order by prod_strctr_nm asc, prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchProductStructureIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prod_strctr_sys_id from ( select distinct a.prod_strctr_sys_id as prod_strctr_sys_id, a.prod_strctr_nm as prod_strctr_nm, a.prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr as prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.prod_strctr_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'ProdStructure' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and
order by prod_strctr_nm asc, prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr asc)

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.prod_strctr_sys_id from PROD_STRCTR_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN a, PROD_STRCTR_MSTR b where a.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = b.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {0} order by b.prod_strctr_nm asc, b.prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortProductStructureIdentifiers

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.prod_strctr_nm, a.prod_strctr_vrsn_nbr, a.prod_strctr_efctv_dt, a.prod_strctr_expiry_dt, a.prod_strctr_stts_cd from PROD_STRCTR_MSTR a where a.prod_strctr_sys_id = {0}

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitComponentIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select bnft_cmpnt_sys_id from ( select distinct a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id as bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_nm as bnft_cmpnt_nm, a.bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr as bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.bnft_cmpnt_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'BENEFITCOMP' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and (
order by bnft_cmpnt_nm asc, bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitComponentIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select bnft_cmpnt_sys_id from ( select distinct a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id as bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, a.bnft_cmpnt_nm as bnft_cmpnt_nm, a.bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr as bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.bnft_cmpnt_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'BENEFITCOMP' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and
order by bnft_cmpnt_nm asc, bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr asc)

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id from BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN a, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b where a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and a.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} order by b.bnft_cmpnt_nm asc, b.bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortBenefitComponentIdentifiers

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN a,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR b where a.NOTE_ID = {0} and a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = {1} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCOMP' and b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.ENTY_SYS_ID order by b.bnft_cmpnt_nm asc, b.bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr asc

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.bnft_cmpnt_nm, a.bnft_cmpnt_vrsn_nbr, a.bnft_cmpnt_efctv_dt, a.bnft_cmpnt_expiry_dt, a.bnft_cmpnt_stts_cd from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a where a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = {0}

DataSource.name: prmd

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select bnft_sys_id from( select distinct a.bnft_sys_id as bnft_sys_id, a.bnft_id_nm as bnft_id_nm, a.bnft_vrsn_nbr as bnft_vrsn_nbr from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a INNER JOIN enty_domn_info b on a.bnft_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn c on b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: INNER JOIN (select ENTY_SYS_ID,SLCTD_ITEM_CD from BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO where SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE = {22}) d on a.bnft_sys_id = d.enty_sys_id
INNER JOIN (select ENTY_SYS_ID,SLCTD_ITEM_CD from BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO where SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE = {23}) f on a.bnft_sys_id = f.enty_sys_id
INNER JOIN (select ENTY_SYS_ID,SLCTD_ITEM_CD from BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO where SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE = {24}) g on a.bnft_sys_id = g.enty_sys_id
INNER JOIN (select ENTY_SYS_ID,SLCTD_ITEM_CD from BNFT_BSIC_SLCTD_INFO where SLCTD_ITEM_TYPE = {25}) e on a.bnft_sys_id = e.enty_sys_id
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
LEFT OUTER JOIN BMNDT_BNFT_MNDT h on a.BNFT_SYS_ID = h.BNFT_SYS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMNDT_CITTN_INFO i on h.BNFT_MNDT_SYS_ID = i.BNFT_MNDT_SYS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMNDT_STCD_INFO j on h.BNFT_MNDT_SYS_ID = j.BNFT_MNDT_SYS_ID
WHERE b.enty_type = 'stdbenefit' and (
order by bnft_id_nm asc, bnft_vrsn_nbr asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select bnft_sys_id from( select distinct a.bnft_sys_id as bnft_sys_id, a.bnft_id_nm as bnft_id_nm, a.bnft_vrsn_nbr as bnft_vrsn_nbr from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.bnft_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'stdbenefit' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and
order by bnft_id_nm asc, bnft_vrsn_nbr asc)

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.bnft_sys_id from BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL b, BMST_BNFT_MSTR c where a.bnft_defn_sys_id = b.bnft_defn_sys_id and a.bnft_sys_id = c.bnft_sys_id and b.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = {0} order by c.bnft_id_nm asc, c.bnft_vrsn_nbr asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortBenefitIdentifiers

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN a,BMST_BNFT_MSTR b where a.NOTE_ID = {0} and a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = {1} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHBENEFIT' and b.bnft_sys_id = a.ENTY_SYS_ID order by b.bnft_id_nm asc, b.bnft_vrsn_nbr asc

DataSource.name: prmd
prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM,d.CD_DESC_TXT,e.CD_DESC_TXT,b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC FROM BLN_BNFT_LINE a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL b, (select * from item where CTLG_ID='1935') d, (select * from item where CTLG_ID='1936') e WHERE a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA=e.PRMRY_CD(+) and b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR=d.PRMRY_CD(+) and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID={0}

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID from BLN_BNFT_LINE a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL b where a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID in (select ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where NOTE_ID = {0} and NOTE_VRSN_NBR = {1} and ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHBNFTLINE') and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID order by b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortBenefitLineIdentifiers
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
SELECT a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID FROM BLN_BNFT_LINE a, BLVL_BNFT_LVL b,
(select * from item where CTLG_ID='1935') d, (select * from item where CTLG_ID='1936') e
WHERE a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID=b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID
and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA=e.PRMRY_CD(+) and b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR=d.PRMRY_CD(+) and a.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID {0}

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitLevelIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select blvl_bnft_lvl_id,BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID from ( select distinct c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id as blvl_bnft_lvl_id, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc as blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID as BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID from BLVL_BNFT_LVL c INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR b on b.bnft_defn_sys_id = c.bnft_defn_sys_id INNER JOIN BMST_BNFT_MSTR a on a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id INNER JOIN enty_domn_info d on a.bnft_parnt_sys_id = d.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn e on d.domn_sys_id = e.domn_sys_id LEFT OUTER JOIN BLN_BNFT_LINE f on c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = f.blvl_bnft_lvl_id where d.enty_type = 'stdbenefit' and (
order by blvl_bnft_lvl_desc asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchBenefitLevelIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select blvl_bnft_lvl_id,BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID from ( select distinct c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id as blvl_bnft_lvl_id, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc as blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID as BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR b, BLVL_BNFT_LVL c, enty_domn_info d, avlbl_domn e where a.bnft_sys_id = b.bnft_sys_id and b.bnft_defn_sys_id = c.bnft_defn_sys_id and a.bnft_parnt_sys_id = d.enty_sys_id and d.enty_type = 'stdbenefit' and d.domn_sys_id = e.domn_sys_id and
order by blvl_bnft_lvl_desc asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortBenefitLevelIdentifiers
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM BLVL_BNFT_LVL b, (select * from item where CTLG_ID='1935') d where b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR=d.PRMRY_CD(+) and (b.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, b.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) in {0}

DataSource.name: prmd

SelectSQLQuery.name: retrieveDescriptionForTermId
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prmry_cd, cd_desc_txt from item where
and ctlg_id = {1}

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchNotesIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select NOTE_ID, NOTE_VRSN_NBR from NMST_NOTE_MSTR where LGCY_IND = 'N' and
order by NOTE_NM asc, NOTE_VRSN_NBR asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchNotesIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select distinct a.NOTE_ID, a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR from NMST_NOTE_MSTR a left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILPRODUCT') b on a.NOTE_ID = b.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=b.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILCOMP') c on a.NOTE_ID = c.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=c.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILBENEFIT') d on a.NOTE_ID = d.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=d.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILTERM') e on a.NOTE_ID = e.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=e.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILQUALIFIER') f on a.NOTE_ID = f.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=f.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN (SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='SYSTEM DOMAIN') g on a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=g.note_vrsn_nbr left outer JOIN ( SELECT distinct NOTE_ID,NOTE_VRSN_NBR,ENTY_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN where ENTY_TYPE='AVAILQUESTION') h on a.NOTE_ID = h.NOTE_ID and a.note_vrsn_nbr=h.note_vrsn_nbr where LGCY_IND = 'N' and
order by a.NOTE_ID asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortNotesIdentifiers
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select a.NOTE_ID , a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR from NMST_NOTE_MSTR a where

DataSource.name: prmd

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchContractIdentifiersForAdvancedSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select CNTRCT_SYS_ID,DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from ( select distinct d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID as DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID as CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID as CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR as CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a INNER JOIN enty_domn_info b on a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn c on b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN f on f.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT d on d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = f.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERSHIP_INFO e on (a.CNTRCT_ID =e.CNTRCT_ID and d.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT = e.CNTRCT_EFCTV_DT) where b.enty_type = 'contract' and (
order by CNTRCT_ID asc, CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: searchContractIdentifiersForBasicSearch
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select CNTRCT_SYS_ID,DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from ( select distinct d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID as DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID as CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID as CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR as CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT d ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN e where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID= d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID=e.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and
order by CNTRCT_ID asc, CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR asc)

SelectSQLQuery.name: sortContractIdentifiers

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.ENTY_SYS_ID,c.CNTRCT_SYS_ID from NOTE_DOMN_ASSN a,CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR c,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d where a.NOTE_ID ={0} and a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = {1} and a.ENTY_TYPE = 'ATTACHCONTRACT' and a.ENTY_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and d.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = c.CNTRCT_SYS_ID order by c.CNTRCT_ID

SelectSQLQuery.name: retrieveContractDetailUsingIdentifier
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: and b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = c.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID=c.CNTRCT_SYS_ID(+)

SelectSQLQuery.name: viewBenefitDetails
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select bnft_sys_id,bnft_vrsn_nbr,BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID,BNFT_STTS_CD,BUS_GRP_NM,BUS_ENTY_NM,LOB_NM,bnft_id_nm from( select distinct a.bnft_sys_id as bnft_sys_id, a.bnft_id_nm as bnft_id_nm, a.bnft_vrsn_nbr as bnft_vrsn_nbr,a.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID as BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.BNFT_STTS_CD as BNFT_STTS_CD ,c.BUS_GRP_NM as BUS_GRP_NM,c.BUS_ENTY_NM as BUS_ENTY_NM,c.LOB_NM as LOB_NM from BMST_BNFT_MSTR a INNER JOIN enty_domn_info b on a.bnft_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn c on b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id WHERE b.enty_type = 'stdbenefit' and a.bnft_sys_id={0})

SelectSQLQuery.name: viewBenefitComponentDetails
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR,BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID,BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD,BUS_GRP_NM,BUS_ENTY_NM,LOB_NM,BNFT_CMPNT_NM,BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE from( select distinct a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID as BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, a.BNFT_CMPNT_NM as BNFT_CMPNT_NM, a.BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR as BNFT_CMPNT_VRSN_NBR,a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID as BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD as BNFT_CMPNT_STTS_CD ,c.BUS_GRP_NM as BUS_GRP_NM,c.BUS_ENTY_NM as BUS_ENTY_NM,c.LOB_NM as LOB_NM,a.BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE as BNFT_CMPNT_TYPE from BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR a INNER JOIN enty_domn_info b on a.BNFT_CMPNT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.enty_sys_id INNER JOIN avlbl_domn c on b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id WHERE b.enty_type = 'BENEFITCOMP' and a.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID={0})

SelectSQLQuery.name: viewProductStructureDetails
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC:
SELECT PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID, PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID, PROD_STRCTR_NM, PROD_STRCTR_VRSN_NBR, PROD_STRCTR_STTS_CD, PROD_STRCTR_TYPE, PROD_STRCTR_MNDT_TYPE, PROD_STRCTR_ST_CD from( select distinct A.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID as PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID, A.PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID as PROD_STRCTR_PARNT_SYS_ID, A.PROD_STRCTR_NM as PROD_STRCTR_NM, A.PROD_STRCTR_VRSN_NBR as PROD_STRCTR_VRSN_NBR,A.PROD_STRCTR_STTS_CD as PROD_STRCTR_STTS_CD,A.PROD_STRCTR_TYPE as PROD_STRCTR_TYPE, A.PROD_STRCTR_MNDT_TYPE as PROD_STRCTR_MNDT_TYPE, A.PROD_STRCTR_ST_CD as PROD_STRCTR_ST_CD
FROM PROD_STRCTR_MSTR A WHERE PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID={0})

SelectSQLQuery.name: viewContractDetails
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select CNTRCT_SYS_ID,DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,CNTRCT_ID,CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,CNTRCT_STTS_CD from ( select distinct d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID as DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID as CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID as CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR as CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD as CNTRCT_STTS_CD from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT d , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN e where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'contract' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and e.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID=e.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ={0} and d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID={1})

SelectSQLQuery.name: viewProductDetails
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select prod_sys_id,prod_nm,prod_vrsn_nbr,PROD_EFCTV_DT,PROD_EXPIRY_DT,prod_parnt_sys_id,BUS_GRP_NM,BUS_ENTY_NM,LOB_NM from ( select distinct a.prod_sys_id as prod_sys_id, a.prod_nm as prod_nm, a.prod_vrsn_nbr as prod_vrsn_nbr ,a.PROD_EFCTV_DT as PROD_EFCTV_DT,a.PROD_EXPIRY_DT as PROD_EXPIRY_DT,a.prod_parnt_sys_id as prod_parnt_sys_id ,c.BUS_GRP_NM as BUS_GRP_NM,c.BUS_ENTY_NM as BUS_ENTY_NM,c.LOB_NM as LOB_NM from PROD_MSTR a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c where a.prod_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id and b.enty_type = 'product' and b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id and a.prod_sys_id={0})
